Package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.Activities

package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.Activities
  • Related Packages

    Description

  • Class
    Description
    LeaderboardActivity
    The LeaderboardActivity displays a list of user scores in descending order.
    LeaderboardAdapter
    The LeaderboardAdapter class is responsible for displaying user scores in a RecyclerView.
    QuestionAdapter
    The QuestionAdapter class is responsible for displaying trivia questions in a RecyclerView.
    QuestionAdapter.ViewHolder
     
    QuestionDetails
    The QuestionDetails class represents a single question retrieved from a trivia API.
    QuestionsActivity
    The QuestionsActivity displays a list of trivia questions for the user to answer.
    SplashScreenActivity
    The SplashScreenActivity displays a splash screen for a brief period before transitioning to the TriviaActivity.
    TriviaActivity
    The TriviaActivity provides options to start a trivia game, view the leaderboard, and get help.
    UserScore
    The UserScore class represents the user's score and related information.
    UserScoreDao
     
    UserScoreDatabase
    The UserScoreDatabase class represents the Room database for managing user scores.
    UserScoreRepository
